ORDER BY r.root DESC, r.reference_no ASC, r.step ASC ) ) r where rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY r.root DESC, r.reference_no ASC, r.step ASC
